abstract.para: All visual and audio material that will be used in the Uludag project will be created in this project.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Graphics & Media Project:
The backgrounds, icons, pointers, visual and audio warnings will be designed for the select desktop, The window features will be dsigned for the select window manager, The font and color scheme will be determined for the select desktop and window manager, in case fonts will be designed, The above steps will be carried out for more than one theme, if possible, The visual and audio components for the in-house developed software (such as the products of the Configuration Tools project) will be designed in accordance with the above mentioned themes, The visual and audio components for the applications fetched from upstream will be designed in accordance with the above mentioned themes, may need arise, The graphics and media tasks for the installer will be carried out, The graphics and media tasks for the documentation will be carried out, The guidelines for the visual features of distribution will be determined and a manual will be prepared, The acceptance test for the contributed visual and audio material will be carried out, the relevant process will be defined and a manual will be prepared, The visual and audio components for public relations, promotion and marketing will be designed, may need arise.
Project contact: Ayşe Genç, ayse@uludag.org.tr
